verses.name: Mark 13:28
verses.text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree; When her branch is yet tender, and putteth forth leaves, ye know that summer is near:

verses.name: Mark 13:29
verses.text: So ye in like manner, when ye shall see these things come to pass, know that it is nigh, even at the doors.

verses.name: Mark 13:30
verses.text: Verily I say unto you, that this generation shall not pass, till all these things be done.

verses.name: Mark 13:31
verses.text: Heaven and earth shall pass away: but my words shall not pass away.
